name: Family Guy RTX
description:
Play as Peter Griffin in an all-new action-packed adventure to fight the IRS from auditing your house, friends, and family!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 (Dev Note) 

*Please be warned that it may be buggy and feel very unfinished. I made everything within 24hours (no clickbait) I hope you enjoy it and I will be adding more stuff very soon to this little family guy metaverse (and fixing many many bugs :D)*
